properties.queries.getBatch:
SELECT
    batch_id,
    operator_id,
    warehouse_id,
    batch_timestamp,
    generated_xml,
    source_json_data,
    generated_filename,
    sftp_directory_path
FROM #{Snowflake Database}.#{Snowflake Schema}.regulatory_batches
WHERE status = 'READY'
ORDER BY batch_timestamp ASC;

properties.SQL Query:
UPDATE #{Snowflake Database}.#{Snowflake Schema}.regulatory_batches 
SET status = 'UPLOADED', 
    upload_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
WHERE batch_id = '${meta.batchId}'
